summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2719, for the improvement of Manning Street, from 41st Avenue Southwest to Walnut Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, constructing concrete sidewalks, together with necessary crosswalks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31982 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
